submission_requirements: Must follow the 'IEEE Submission and Peer Review Policy'
Must comply with the 'ACM Policy on Authorship'

ACM_OPEN_agreements_impact: Most authors will not have to pay Article Processing Charges (APC)
Authors not covered may need to pay, but there are waivers and discounts available

details.scope: Inviting high-quality submissions of technical research papers on original and unpublished software engineering results.
additional_important_points: Submissions cannot reveal authors' identities and must adhere to anonymity guidelines.
One author from accepted papers must register to present at the conference.
